newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Port conditions update - Sri Lanka - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Sri Lanka - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

COLOMBO, Nov 27 - twelve container dischargers/loaders, four food dischargers, three fertiliser dischargers, one gas discharger, six general cargo loaders presently working in port. Three container discharger/loaders, two fertiliser dischargers, one food discharger and one general cargo discharger awaiting berths.
